## About Me

I'm a PhD student in **Biostatistics and Genetic Epidemiology** at [CESP](https://cesp.inserm.fr/) (Universit√© Paris-Saclay, UVSQ, Inserm), Villejuif, in the **HiDiBiostat** team. My research focuses on developing graph-based machine learning methods to extract genotype-phenotype associations from heterogeneous, multi-scale cohort data (10,000 participants). Integrating clinical, pharmacological, and genomic data using network representations and deep learning approaches.

I am supervised by [Anne-Louise Leutenegger](https://cvscience.aviesan.fr/cv/719/anne-louise-leutenegger) (CESP/NeuroDiderot, INSERM), [Ana√Øs Baudot](https://www.marseille-medical-genetics.org/a-baudot/) (CNRS/MMG, Aix-Marseille Universit√©), and [Anne-Sophie Jannot](https://heka.gitlabpages.inria.fr/team/members/jannot.html) (BNDMR, HeKA).
